name: Speed Box (itch)
description:
Speed Box is a game that designed for speedrunners and 2D platformer enjoyer. Speed Box is still in development and on low graphic. Though it only has two levels, simple game mechanics and a tremendously full of bugs and glicthes. The polished version of the game is not promised to be out soon.

The current version is 1.0 and there will be some fixes and update on the sooner version of the game.
